
plot_comparison
===============



.. py:function:: stimupy.utils.plotting.plot_comparison(original_img, new_img)


   Plots visual comparison of two image-arrays

   :param original_img: original image-array
   :type original_img: numpy.ndarray
   :param new_img: new image-array
   :type new_img: numpy.ndarray

   :returns: Figure containing plots of images, and their comparison(s)
   :rtype: matplotlib.Figure
